response.original_title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
response.overview: A sudden attack by Wulf, a clever and traitorous lord of Rohan seeking vengeance for the death of his father, forces Helm Hammerhand, the King of Rohan, and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg.
response.tagline: Hope has yet to abandon these lands.
response.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
